name: Don't be the host
description:
The party of the century!!!

But it can't go forever, the parents of the house are on their way home. If only there weren't all the drunks who are starting to trash the place.

Up to ten player can join as cleanup crew or drunken party people. Winner is the team that has repaired or broken more before time runs out and the parents are at home.

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2020.

Credits - Capes and Beards - NameJobSebastian Genz
